# Load libraries

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(fastTopics)
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(wesanderson)

#Set ggplot theme as classic
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

# load the dataset

```{r}
Hem.data <- readRDS("../QC.filtered.cells.RDS")

counts <- Hem.data@raw.data

```

# Fit the topic model

```{r}
fit <- fit_topic_model(counts,k = 6)
```
